title: Sivir Spell shield "bug"?
body:
Sivir's Spellshield doesn't work on karmas W.
i was playing Twisted treeline, it also has an increased cast time? it feels like 1.5 seconds BEFORE it activates  (i checked i wasn't lagging)

Would appreciate any help regarding this.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This isnt a bug afaik, you need to cast the spellshield before she casts her w.
I activate it before she activcates her W. i asked a rioter about this and its intentional. it also doesn't work on Leblancs E, Or thats what i was told. Thanks for the reply though.

Hey there,

Having spoken to a few people who main karma and conducting my own tests I can in fact confirm that karmas w can be spellshielded, Bear in mind however that the tether has two parts that will pop the shield.

if you shield the first stage (the initial cast = instant) then you will not be tethered.
if you shield the second stage (the root after 2 seconds) then you will not be snared.
Thank you for helping out and thank you for this information, i'll keep this in mind when playing Sivir against karma. (:
